name: Wild Widow Wife
description:
Did you ever imagined the life of a spider taking shape of women? No?
Did you at least wondered how they would adapt their lives in our new century?

Whatever the answer, this game is an answer, I, lonely dev, did under 72hours.

Manage your money, your food, prepare yourself to invite some naive losers at home and enjoy the feast... You must make sure your offspring will reach the adult age and leave the home.

This game is a project for a gamejam with the theme "WEB" and the limitation "There is no ground". In this game, you'll see web, you'll use the web and you will of course never stare at the ground.

This project might be subject of updates that for sure!
Thank you for reading!
